title: Widefoot’s Colored Cargo Cages Are Back
content: Widefoot’s durable CargoMounts are back in three bright colors: orange, purple, blue, as well as standard silver and black. These durable, lightweight (68g) cages are made in the USA, come with a 15″ or 20″ Voile strap, and are in stock now at Widefoot for $48-$58.
author: prolly
